changeSet.author: Pritam
changeSet.sql: update global_property set property_value = "SELECT concat(pn.given_name,' ', ifnull(pn.family_name, ' ')) AS name, pi.identifier AS identifier, p.uuid AS uuid, v.uuid AS activeVisitUuid, 'true' AS hasBeenAdmitted FROM visit v, patient_identifier pi, person_name pn, person p WHERE v.patient_id = pi.patient_id AND pi.patient_id = pn.person_id AND p.person_id = pi.patient_id AND p.voided IS FALSE AND v.visit_type_id = (SELECT visit_type_id FROM visit_type WHERE NAME = 'IPD') AND date_stopped IS NULL AND v.visit_id IN(SELECT visit_id FROM encounter WHERE encounter_id IN (SELECT encounter_id FROM obs WHERE concept_id = (SELECT concept_id FROM concept_name WHERE concept_id IN (SELECT concept_id FROM concept_set WHERE concept_set IN (SELECT cn.concept_id FROM concept_name cn WHERE cn.name IN ('TR, Admission - Informations générales') AND cn.voided IS FALSE AND cn.concept_name_type = 'FULLY_SPECIFIED' AND cn.locale = 'fr')) AND NAME = \"Date d'admission\" AND voided IS FALSE AND concept_name_type = 'SHORT' AND locale = 'fr') AND HOUR(TIMEDIFF(value_datetime, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP())) > 71 AND voided IS FALSE)) AND v.visit_id NOT IN (SELECT visit_id FROM encounter WHERE encounter_id IN (SELECT encounter_id FROM obs WHERE concept_id IN (SELECT concept_id FROM concept_name WHERE NAME IN ('Charge Virale HIV - Value', 'Charge Virale - Value(Bilan de routine IPD)') AND voided IS FALSE AND concept_name_type = 'FULLY_SPECIFIED' AND locale = 'fr') AND value_numeric IS NOT NULL AND voided IS FALSE));" where property= 'emrapi.sqlSearch.admissionsWithoutCV';

changeSet.author: Pritam
changeSet.sql: update global_property set property_value = "SELECT concat(pn.given_name, ' ', ifnull(pn.family_name, '')) AS name, pi.identifier AS identifier, p.uuid AS uuid, v.uuid AS activeVisitUuid, 'true' AS hasBeenAdmitted FROM visit v, patient_identifier pi, person_name pn, person p WHERE v.patient_id = pi.patient_id AND pi.patient_id = pn.person_id AND p.person_id = pi.patient_id AND p.voided IS FALSE AND v.visit_type_id = (SELECT visit_type_id FROM visit_type WHERE NAME = 'IPD') AND date_stopped IS NULL AND v.visit_id IN(SELECT visit_id FROM encounter WHERE encounter_id IN (SELECT encounter_id FROM obs WHERE concept_id = (SELECT concept_id FROM concept_name WHERE concept_id IN (SELECT concept_id FROM concept_set WHERE concept_set IN (SELECT cn.concept_id FROM concept_name cn WHERE cn.name IN ('TR, Admission - Informations générales') AND cn.voided IS FALSE AND cn.concept_name_type = 'FULLY_SPECIFIED' AND cn.locale = 'fr')) AND NAME = \"Date d'admission\" AND voided IS FALSE AND concept_name_type = 'SHORT' AND locale = 'fr') AND HOUR(TIMEDIFF(value_datetime, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP())) > 23 AND voided IS FALSE)) AND v.visit_id NOT IN (SELECT visit_id FROM encounter WHERE encounter_id IN (SELECT encounter_id FROM obs WHERE concept_id IN (SELECT concept_id FROM concept_name WHERE NAME IN ('CD4(cells/µl)', 'CD4(Bilan de routine IPD)', 'CD4') AND voided IS FALSE AND concept_name_type = 'FULLY_SPECIFIED' AND locale = 'fr') AND value_numeric IS NOT NULL AND voided IS FALSE));" where property= 'emrapi.sqlSearch.admissionsWithoutCD4';
